segments.text: How did you first meet Jack each other ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That is a heavy raining afternoon . I was standing under the eaves of a shop to evade the heavy rain . It's getting dark .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I was trembling in the wind when he ran to me with an umbrella in his hand and asked , ' Where is your home ? '
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Then he sent you to your home ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's a romantic meeting . I can say that a hero saves a beauty .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He joked later that I was so poor that he had a kind of impulse to protect an ant .
segments.speaker: S2
